description:
Error Message is not user-friendly

Steps to reproduce:
nova flavor-create testflavor 8 1024 30 2

Expected Result:
ERROR : The flavor ID already exists

Actual Result:
ERROR: Instance Type testflavors already exists. (HTTP 409)
title: Error Message is not user-friendly

comments.content:
Error Message is not user-friendly

Steps to reproduce:
nova flavor-create testflavor 8 1024 30 2

Expected Result:
ERROR : The flavor ID already exists

Actual Result:
ERROR: Instance Type testflavors already exists. (HTTP 409)
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~kommuri-siddanth

comments.content: Could you expand on what's not user friendly about this?  I find what it does now more useful and user-friendly than what you suggest it be changed to, personally.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~russellb

comments.content: We cannot solve the issue you reported without more information. Could you please provide the requested information ?
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ttx

comments.content: This bug lacks the necessary information to effectively reproduce and fix it, therefore it has been closed. Feel free to reopen the bug by providing the requested information and set the bug status back to ''New''.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~ttx
